description: MySQL Monitoring with Telegraf, InfluxDB & Grafana

targets.query: SELECT mean("queries") FROM "mysql_mysql" WHERE ("server" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s)*8 FROM "mysql_mysql" WHERE ("server" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "mysql_mysql" WHERE ("server" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: MySQL
